author: Mieka Smiles
title: 2024 celebrations pictured: How people around the world rang in the new year | World | News | Express.co.uk
text:
Happy New Year! The New Year’s celebrations in the UK may have taken a bit of a battering due to raging weather. But that didn’t stop 100,000 ticket holders from storming to London to watch the capital’s biggest ever firework display.
So how did other countries say hello to 2024? Here we take a look at some of the ways people celebrated the turning of a new chapter in pictures - from a huge party in Times Square, New York through to New Year's Day dips around the world.
Some of the most stylish celebrations are caught on camera below.
Rapper LL Cool J was among the artists to ring in the new year at a party in Times Square, New York.
(Image: Getty) Link copied
There were spectacular fireworks in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, as the country said hello to 2024.
(Image: Getty) Link copied
In Kenya they let the bulls battle it out to mark the turning of a page to a new year in a 'bullfighting extravaganza'.
(Image: Getty) Link copied
In Slovenia keen swimmers dove headfirst into 2024 - and left the water feeling fresh on January 1.
(Image: Getty) Link copied Read Get
Indonesians celebrated with music and dancing in the street in Jakarta to mark a new chapter.
(Image: Getty) Link copied ❮ 1 2 NEXT View 3 more photos ❯
